des:
By using Bluguard Smart Home Plus, you can control any Bluguard Smart Home devices with simple voice control.

To control Bluguard Smart Home with Alexa Smart Home Skill, you need:
- Get a Bluguard Smart Home Gateway and its devices (switch or dimmer)
- Download Bluguard SmartHome+ App
- Login Bluguard Smart Home Gateway with Bluguard SmartHome+ App
- Go to Left Side Menu > Choose Home Management > Select Home > Click Setting Button (On the top right of screen)
-  Enable Alexa Service
-  Download Amazon Alexa app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app
-  Search the Alexa Skills directory for "Philio Insight"
-  Click Enable skill of "Philio Insight", then login your Gmail Account
-  Discover devices in Alexa app
-  Say:
 "Alexa, turn on switch"
 "Alexa, turn on the dimmer"
 "Alexa, dim the lights"
